title: Nami Aram Game 1/5/50 = A- Mastery Score

replies.body:
my best guess would be the cs. you've got the lowest in your team. I know you're supp and the grading system is questionable but it's reallt the only explenation i've got.

either that or someone have got a much better score b4, like a few kills, fewer deaths and more assists.

Usually in the game, we always fought. Garen, Gangplank, or Warwick would always engage every time they respawn and get back to we we're at. I tried to cs but then nami's damage was low (like every other support). So I couldn't cs on Nami. I get that the whole grading system is based on how  your cs is, how you help your team, damage you've done, etc. but I couldn't cs or get any kills. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
I feel ya. I never blamed you, the grading system is questionable and feels unfare towards support players.
I was really hoping for an S. rip. But it's sad too that Nami cannot cs well. But oh well, at least I got a good grade and got something. Still tilted.

EDIT: I'm dumb, aram

So much for assist > kills on supports.

It doesn't matter, grades are not just based on your KDA, but also on things like damage/healing, CS or objectives. I recommend an APC build in ARAM instead; being a utility Support that does nothing but buff your allies is not very helpful in ARAM.

I tried to get some ap, but then there wasn't really anything I could do besides heal. If I would've died first, i could go buy items but then my team would've die without me (since there was nothing to help them).

feelsfuckingterribleman

i would've uninstalled after this game
